fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: ~ Deceptive Charm (3-shot): Use with the factional attack. You will attack Astrally, and may choose a disguise role to appear as to investigations for that night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
~ You will roleblock your attack targets.
~ The first time you try to attack an Agent, you will fail and instead gain a permanent private chat with them.
